name: Character Encoding Translator
tagline: Character Encoding Translator is a Java GUI application, console application, and API for converting text files from one character encoding to another.
body:
### Dealing with unmappable characters

Character Encoding Translator supports the ability to replace *unmappable characters* with their numeric character reference equivalents (`"&#NNNN;"`), a useful feature when preparing text for use on the Web.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
